title: Spending The Night With The Hauf Jacket - Remain In Light
description:
_______________________THE-HAUF-JACKET____________________________
__________________________MIXTAPE_________________________________
__________________________________________________________________

REMAIN IN LIGHT!

__________________________________________________________________

These Two Mixtapes Are Made Out Of Love To Exotica, New Wave, 
World Music And Lounge Music. I Made It Out Of Several Samples 
Classified Under The Creative Commons Licens. The Mixtapes Takes 
You On A Travel To Tribes, Voodoo Samples, Aleister Crowley, 
Information About Human Production, Angels, Demons, Lonley Human
Beeings And Munks... It`s A Rather Unique Mix Setting Different 
Sounds Into A Music System And Maybe Create Some Ideas For The New
Beat To Fill The Dancefloor With As Well As A Mix To Fill Your Head
With. These Are Samples Collected To A Musical Handcraft To Design
Certain Emotions. It May Even Provoke Someone, though This Was\nt 
The Idead When I Created These Songs.....

So Get Your Swinging Etnic Headsets On And Let The Hauf Jacket 
Swing The Tunes....................................................
___________________________________________________________________ 
All The Best!

The Hauf Jacket / www.myspace.com/thehaufjacket
